analysis.description:
PLT.TryUnLockCreatorBalance (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#124-142) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- unLockIdx > 0 && block.timestamp >= nextUnLockTime (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#127-142)

PLT._totalBalance should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#90-93)
PLT.creatorsAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#103-111)
PLT.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#87)
PLT.fixTotalBalance should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#87-90)
PLT.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#86)
PLT.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#86-87)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#1): it allows old versions

PLT.ONE_DAY_TIME_LEN (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#97-100) is never used in PLT
PLT.MAX_UINT32 (/unique_chucks/23/0x244c8c078368a47ab3343927edb6f78fbdc93524.sol#102-103) is never used in PLT
